title: JTAC Virtual Trainer
content: A virtual trainer that provides portable accessibility to a highly realistic virtual JTAC training environment, saving the military thousands of dollars by moving away from training environments that only previously existed in fixed dome sites.

title: Bloom
content: A 3D labyrinth-esque puzzle game where the player must manipulate the different faces of an object to create a path from the deer to its goal.

title: Doctor Eisenbarth: Traveling Physician
content: A comedic take on some of Grimms' Fairy Tales with an emphasis on light-hearted narration and spinning the tales with fun, alternate endings.
